fields.name: u8gr6dqr8d
fields.label: Consider Projected Qty in Calculation
fields.description:
If enabled, formula for Qty to Order:
Required Qty (BOM) - Projected Qty.
This helps avoid over-ordering.

fields.label: Consider Projected Qty in Calculation (RM)
fields.description:
If enabled, formula for Required Qty:
Required Qty (BOM) - Projected Qty.
This helps avoid over-ordering.
